-- Create view to get Users data
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[Users] AS
SELECT
    [Id]
    ,[DisplayName]
    ,[LastAccessDate]
    ,[AccountId]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/Full/dbo.Users.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- Create view to get Posts data from partitionned folders
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[Posts] AS
SELECT
    [Year] = [r].filepath(1)
    ,[Month] = [r].filepath(2)
    ,[Id]
    ,[CreationDate]
    ,[PostTypeId]
    ,[Title] = CAST([Title] as nvarchar(200))
    ,[OwnerUserId]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapseplaygroundeu.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/StackOverflow/PartitionedByYearMonth/Posts/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [r]
